name: bnomei/kirby3-mobile-detect
description: Static Class and Page Methods for using Mobile Detect Lib

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-mobile-detect.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-mobile-detect; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
